title: Can you get banned for spamming emotes to tilt the enemy?
body: Emotes as in jokes, laughs, taunts, dancing, champion mastery, new emotes, etc. Just wondering. If so, why?

replies.body: Pretty sure this isn't a bannable offense since everyone has the option of simply muting those emotes.
This line of logic seems pretty faulty. You also have the option to mute the guy who's flaming and raging, but that is a bannable offence.
Lol come on man at least talk to the player behavior team before saying that

They can mute emotes. IM sure if Riot didn't implement this feature you would surely get banned. But since muting is an option. As soon as you start seeing emotes appearing more frequently than you want, you can mute them. This Logic however doesn't work when using chat. Don't be toxic.

doubt it.  I knew a guy who spammed **gger all game every game and didn't get banned for over 6 months.  When did he get banned?  the day after he posted here on forum that he spams **gger at people all game every game.  

Plus you can spam ping everyone all game and riot doesn't care/track it so doubt they do anything for this
